answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some links that may be useful to your research.
This article discusses proper disposal of background checks to include shredding documents.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6208/Wolves_in_Volunteers_Clothing_The_Need_for_Background_Checks
The city of Palm Bay implemented an automated fingerprint background screening system to help streamline the hiring process. You might want to contact them for more information about their program.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/20578/Fingerprint_Background_Screening 
This is a sample of guidelines for how background checks should be used.
http://www.units.muohio.edu/aao/documents/GUIDELINES%20FOR%20EMPLOYEE%20BACKGROUND%20CHECKS-09.pdf 
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
